typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		review_id as string,
		order_id as string,
		review_score as integer,
		review_creation_date as date,
		review_answer_timestamp as date,
		review_sentiment as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> OrderReviewSource
source(output(
		sk_review as integer,
		review_id as string,
		order_id as string,
		review_score as integer,
		review_creation_date as timestamp,
		review_sentiment as string,
		review_answer_timestamp as timestamp,
		scd_created_at as timestamp,
		scd_is_current as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> DimOrderreviews
OrderReviewSource derive(scd_is_current = "YES",
		scd_created_at = currentTimestamp()) ~> addingSCDIsCurrent
DimOrderreviews select(mapColumn(
		DIM_sk_review = sk_review,
		DIM_review_id = review_id,
		DIM_order_id = order_id,
		DIM_review_score = review_score,
		DIM_review_creation_date = review_creation_date,
		DIM_review_sentiment = review_sentiment,
		DIM_review_answer_timestamp = review_answer_timestamp,
		DIM_scd_created_at = scd_created_at,
		DIM_scd_is_current = scd_is_current
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> renameOLTPColumns
OrderReviewSource, renameOLTPColumns lookup(order_id == DIM_order_id
	&& review_id == DIM_review_id,
	multiple: true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LookupForExistingRows
LookupForExistingRows filter(!isNull(DIM_review_id)) ~> FilterExistingRows
SelectRequiredRows derive(scd_is_current = "NO") ~> SetIsCurrentToNo
SetIsCurrentToNo alterRow(updateIf(1==1)) ~> AlterRows
FilterExistingRows select(mapColumn(
		sk_review = DIM_sk_review,
		review_id = DIM_review_id,
		order_id = DIM_order_id,
		review_score = DIM_review_score,
		review_creation_date = DIM_review_creation_date,
		review_sentiment = DIM_review_sentiment,
		review_answer_timestamp = DIM_review_answer_timestamp,
		scd_created_at = DIM_scd_created_at,
		scd_is_current = DIM_scd_is_current
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectRequiredRows
addingSCDIsCurrent sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		sk_review as integer,
		review_id as string,
		order_id as string,
		review_score as integer,
		review_creation_date as timestamp,
		review_sentiment as string,
		review_answer_timestamp as timestamp,
		scd_created_at as timestamp,
		scd_is_current as string
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	saveOrder: 2,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		review_id,
		order_id,
		review_score,
		review_creation_date,
		review_sentiment,
		review_answer_timestamp,
		scd_created_at,
		scd_is_current
	)) ~> sinkAllatFirst
AlterRows sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		sk_review as integer,
		review_id as string,
		order_id as string,
		review_score as integer,
		review_creation_date as timestamp,
		review_sentiment as string,
		review_answer_timestamp as timestamp,
		scd_created_at as timestamp,
		scd_is_current as string
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['sk_review'],
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	saveOrder: 1,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		sk_review,
		review_id,
		order_id,
		review_score,
		review_creation_date,
		review_sentiment,
		review_answer_timestamp,
		scd_created_at,
		scd_is_current
	)) ~> sinkwithUpdatingSCD
